column2: Both Scientists and Cultists are watching the heavens as a strange object appears in the night sky.\n'
A new star fills the sky. The blazing mass appears to be heading directly towards Earth!
Your freinds, the Migo, have returned in the night!\nThere is no need for alarm, it's not going to hit your country!\nBut please keep a detailed record of the devastation it will cause.
The blazing mass has smashed into your country at $COUNTRYNAME$.
The province has been ruined by the impact.
The province has been disrupted by the impact.
